PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MaterialCombustion
PropertySetDef.Definition: A set of extended material properties of products of combustion generated by elements typically used within the context of building services and flow distribution systems.

PropertyDef.Name: SpecificHeatCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Specific heat of the products of combustion: heat energy absorbed per temperature unit.

PropertyDef.Name: N20Content
PropertyDef.Definition: Nitrous oxide (N2O) content of the products of combustion. This is measured in weight of N2O per unit weight and is therefore unitless.

PropertyDef.Name: COContent
PropertyDef.Definition: Carbon monoxide (CO) content of the products of combustion. This is measured in weight of CO per unit weight and is therefore unitless.

PropertyDef.Name: CO2Content
PropertyDef.Definition: Carbon dioxide (CO2) content of the products of combustion. This is measured in weight of CO2 per unit weight and is therefore unitless.
